    • Uses of HPActor in harrypotter.actions

      Methods in harrypotter.actions with parameters of type HPActor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Attack.act​(HPActor a)
      Perform the Attack command on an entity.
      void Move.act​(HPActor a)
      Perform the Move action.
      void Take.act​(HPActor a)
      Perform the Take action by setting the item carried by the HPActor to the target ( the HPActor a's item carried would be the target of this Take).
      boolean Attack.canDo​(HPActor a)
      Determine whether a particular HPActor a can attack the target.
      boolean Move.canDo​(HPActor a)
      Returns if or not a HPActor a can perform a Move command.
      boolean Take.canDo​(HPActor a)
      Returns if or not this Take can be performed by the HPActor a.
